title: California tenants are fighting rent increases and want a crackdown on bad landlords: ‘My babies don’t feel safe’
dc:creator: Janie Har, The Associated Press
description: Tenants are taking to ballot boxes and city councils to fight harassment, shoddy living conditions, and unresponsive landlords.
content:encoded: Tenants are taking to ballot boxes and city councils to fight harassment, shoddy living conditions, and unresponsive landlords. Read More
